overview: March 2020. A mysterious virus circulates around the world. A woman who works for a television channel, which is broadcast digitally, waits for her husband to come find her. While waiting, she falls asleep and at that very moment, in Argentina a strict quarantine is established: those who are in the City of Buenos Aires cannot go to the Buenos Aires suburbs, and vice versa. Unable to return to her house, she stays at her workplace. "Don't worry, it's only 15 days," he consoles her. But the weeks go by and the woman begins to get the idea of living there. Even shortly after the confinement, she finds out that she is pregnant.
title: Quarantined (Encuarentenada)
